::KitKat::
She heard the knocking and called out. "I'll be right out."
She looked down at Apocalypse. "Will there be anything else?" She 
smiled. She liked having a bot like him on her side.

Feline2::
She felt his kiss again. She smiled slightly. "You, you will betray 
your own kind to stay with me?" 

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> "You'll have your chance. First we'll see KitKat, then you can get 
a CR
> tank." 
> They reached the base. He walked to the meeting room and knocked.
> "KitKat? You in there love?"
> 
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "I understand. I will stay with you."
> He gave her another light kiss.
> "Omae o korosu," he said again.
> "Thats Japanese for 'I love you'."
> He took her hand.
> "Come on. Lets get you patched up."
